knowledgeBase.title: How to Reset Your Password
knowledgeBase.content:
Step-by-step guide for password reset:

1. Navigate to the login page
2. Click 'Forgot Password' link below login form
3. Enter your registered email address
4. Check email inbox (and spam folder) for reset link
5. Click the link within 24 hours (it expires)
6. Create a new strong password meeting requirements
7. Log in with new password

Password requirements:
- Minimum 8 characters
- At least one uppercase letter
- At least one number
- At least one special character

Troubleshooting:
- Not receiving email? Check spam folder and verify email address
- Link expired? Request a new reset
- Still having issues? Contact support

tier2.process:
1. Document all troubleshooting steps attempted
2. Gather relevant logs and screenshots
3. Assign ticket to Tier 2 queue
4. Brief Tier 2 agent via internal notes
5. Notify customer of escalation and expected response time
tier2.sla: 4 hour response for high priority, 24 hours for medium/low

tier3.process:
1. Create detailed bug report or incident ticket
2. Include reproduction steps
3. Notify engineering team via designated channel
4. Set customer expectations for fix timeline
5. Provide workaround if available
tier3.sla: Immediate for critical issues, 1 business day for others

emergency.process:
1. Immediately notify on-call engineer
2. Create incident in monitoring system
3. Alert support manager
4. Begin customer communication plan
5. Document all actions in incident log
emergency.communication: Update status page every 30 minutes, email affected customers within 1 hour
